usage: Used for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation exercises, and general home or gym workouts.
key_features: Includes 2 kg pack of 2 dumbbells in blue
Neoprene anti-slip coating for comfortable, secure grip
Suitable for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
Durable construction resistant to wear and tear
Easy to wipe clean after use
KAKSS branding printed on dumbbell ends
ai_description: A pair of compact hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth matte neoprene coating, shown in solid blue and purple finishes. Each dumbbell has the KAKSS logo and weight marking on the end. The coated metal build and flat sides give them a sturdy, non-rolling, easy-grip appearance.
target_audience: Home fitness users, gym-goers, beginners to intermediate exercisers, and individuals doing rehabilitation or light strength training.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (2 kg Pack of 2, Blue)
